text: @KathleenChu5 @momsresistnow Trump want to pretend the coronavirus isn't a problem.   The media let him off the hook.  The media gets me sick.  Media is 24 hour protests.  Ridiculous waste of the news.  Rachel maddow is the only person who does their job
